8 ounces of softened cream cheese 8
ounces of shredded low-moisture

so we're gonna cook all that out about
four to five minutes over medium heat
before grating in 3 cloves of garlic and

together for another one to two minutes
until everybody's really gotten to know

everybody gets all melty
or even goes in the oven we are of
course going to season with kosher salt

lastly topping with a generous grating
of Parmesan cheese before placing into a
375-degree oven for about 20-25 minutes
until browned and bubbly place on a heat
proof surface with some toasts or
crackers and serve I know you guys were
